Summary: 3 shiny sphere shape objects flying around.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside looking into the sky like I normaly do when letting my dogs out when I noticed a sphere shaped object flying near a plane. I then noticed 3 flying around. I ran into the house to get my wife when I came back I notice one flying west. They flew behind trees where we couldn't see so we moved into another part of the yard. The 3 objects formed a triangle shape and began flying toward the west.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Battle Creek
There were no other sightings in Battle Creek on or around April 9th 2009
